mapper.sql: a._id AS "Id", a.system AS "system", a.bussinessid AS "bussinessid", a.bussinesstype AS "bussinesstype", a.content AS "content", a.operator AS "operator", a.createtime AS "createtime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bis_log( _id, system, bussinessid, bussinesstype, content, operator, createtime ) VALUES ( #{Id}, #{system}, #{bussinessid}, #{bussinesstype}, #{content}, #{operator}, #{createtime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bis_log SET _id = #{Id}, system = #{system}, bussinessid = #{bussinessid}, bussinesstype = #{bussinesstype}, content = #{content}, operator = #{operator}, createtime = #{createtime} WHERE id = #{id}
